messages.message:
Hi Team,
I observed an issue in *Golden Evaluation*:
• When I *deselect a field* in the golden configuration, that field is removed from the *GUI display* as expected.
• The next field in the list correctly takes its place visually.
• :exclamation:However, *expanding that next field* shows the details of the *deselected field* instead of its own data.
This seems like a *UI/field mapping bug* that could confuse evaluators and lead to incorrect validations.
CC @Swathy N @Nithin @Raushan Kumar Pandey
https://pg.aihub.instabase.com/hub/apps/8cb0b5a1-bafc-40ed-80de-e0f51e0ebbf9/accuracy/221

what do you mean by expanding the next field shows the details of the deselected field? can you provide a screen recording?

see my screen recording, which shows the expected and correct behavior on aihub.instabase.com (http://aihub.instabase.com)
https://instabase.zoom.us/clips/share/4fK8T1gwT46vVh-Mvdq7pA
Passcode: S&3^$KuG
